entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 01:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2 except minus 2 inland.
entry.summary: Snow. Rain along the coast late in the morning and early afternoon. Blowing snow inland late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 2 except minus 2 inland. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow inland in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
